com.siperian.sif.message.mrm

Class DescribeSiperianObjectRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siperian.sif.message.SiperianRequest
      • com.siperian.sif.message.mrm.DescribeSiperianObjectRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DescribeSiperianObjectRequest
extends SiperianRequest
    Represents a request object to retrieve the metadata of the MDM Hub objects.

    Use Case
    You can use the DescribeSiperianObjectRequest object to gather information about an MDM Hub object before you perform any operations on it.

    See Also:
    SiperianObjectType, ListSiperianObjectsRequest, com.siperian.sif.message.metadata, Serialized Form

    API Pair: DescribeSiperianObjectResponse

    API Group: Metadata

    • Method Detail

      • getTransactionAttributeType

        public TransactionAttributeType getTransactionAttributeType()
        Gets the type of transaction attribute that specifies whether this request can participate in the transactions. The MDM Hub Server uses this method to determine the transactional capabilities of a request. A client application does not use this method.

        Overrides:
        getTransactionAttributeType in class SiperianRequest
        Returns:
        • NOT_SUPPORTED if the request cannot participate in the transactions.
        • SUPPORTS if the request can participate in the transactions.
        • REQUIRED if the request requires a transaction.
        • REQUIRES_NEW if the request requires a new transaction.

      • setUids

        public void setUids(ArrayList uids)
        Sets a list of UIDs of the MDM Hub objects for which you want to retrieve the metadata.
        Parameters:
        uids - List of UIDs of the MDM Hub objects.

      • getUids

        public ArrayList getUids()
        Gets a list of UIDs of the MDM Hub objects for which you want to retrieve the metadata.

        Returns:
        List of UIDs of the MDM Hub objects.

      • addUid

        public void addUid(String uid)
        Adds the UID of an MDM Hub object to the list of unique identifiers of the MDM Hub objects for which you want to retrieve the metadata.

        Parameters:
        uid - UID of an MDM Hub object.
